title: @Riot Concering board moderation
body:
I just received a warning that has me completely perplexed. I had a discussion thread going where I was trying to explain to some idiot (sorry, but this is easily the most correct term) that the word "nigger" is extremely offensive and anyone who uses it should be punished. I even gave him a link on the history of the word so he would understand why it's offensive. He then also tried to insist that the word "nigga" was completely different. (Honestly, I can't make this shit up).  I guess he then reported me(!) for me telling him that he was stupid (which as you can see, is absolutely true). 

What the hell people. Do you not look at the thread at all before warning or banning someone?  You claim to be harsh on racist remarks but you not only just let someone completely slide, you punished the other party.
